response.original_title: Galileo Galilei - Last Live - Sharin no Jiku - at Nippon Budokan
response.overview: Last Live-Sharin no Jiku-at Nippon Budokan / Galileo Galilei DVD Disc containing the last live performance of the band, held at Nippon Budokan on Tuesday, October 11th, 2016. The DVD's release date was January 25th, 2017.  Tracklisting:  1  KURAIMA  クライマー  2  KOI NO JUMYOU  恋の寿命  3  ARASHI NO ATTO DE  嵐のあとで  4  CIRCLE GAME  サークルゲーム  5  ASHITA HE  明日へ  6  SAYONARA FRONTIER  さよならフロンティア  7  AOI SHIORI  青い栞  8  BOKU KARA KIMI HE  僕から君へ  9  YOTSUBA SAGASHI NO TABIBITO  四ツ葉さがしの旅人  10  NATSU SORA  夏空  11  HAMANASU NO HANA  ハマナスの花  12  KANSEITOU  管制塔  13  TORI TO TORI  鳥と鳥  14  ROUJIN TO UMI  老人と海  15  HOSHI WO OTOSU  星を落とす  16  BIRTHDAY  Birthday  17  IMAGINARY FRIENDS  Imaginary Friends  18  SEA AND THE DARKNESS 2 (TOTALLY BLACK)  Sea and The Darkness II (Totally Black)  19  HELLO GUBBY  ハローグッバイ  20  SHARIN NO JIKU  車輪の軸
response.title: Galileo Galilei - Last Live - Sharin no Jiku - at Nippon Budokan
